attributes.action: We demand a general election by September at the Latest.
attributes.additional_details: Time & again we read of people dying by suicide after benefit cuts, or lack of treatment.  We must not allow the government to continue destroying the NHS, & killing people by neglect.
attributes.background: My wife committed suicide after she never got the treatment she needed for her multiple health issues.  I called an ambulance to help her, it took two hours to arrive, she then spent a further three hours on a trolley outside A/E. She died in the early hours.
